data.comment: The match has started, with Luton kicking-off.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Bournemouth kick-off.
Diego Rico Salguero is replacing Philip Billing for Bournemouth at Kenilworth Road.
Sam Surridge is on a sub for Junior Stanislas for Bournemouth.
In the minute 67, Jefferson Lerma is booked for the away team.
Jason Tindall is making the team's third substitution at Kenilworth Road with Rodrigo Riquelme replacing David Brooks.
The home team replace Danny Hylton with Harry Cornick.
In the minute 82, Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall (Luton) gets a yellow card.
The home team replace James Collins with Sam Nombe.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Luton make their third substitution with Matty Pearson replacing Dan Potts.
